about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Positron Energy Limited provides management and technical advisory for the oil and gas industry in India. They offer end-to-end gas distribution solutions, including management consultancy, project management, and operation and management services. The company has developed a gas aggregation business focusing on natural gas and utilizes common carrier pipeline networks in the Indian market.

The company is certified according to ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 45001:2018 standards. This certification ensures the quality of consultancy and O&M services provided to the oil and gas sector.

The company serves major oil and gas sector players, including both public sector companies and private firms.
The services of the company include the following
  1. Project Management Consultation (PMC),
  2. Operations and Maintenance of CGD (City Gas Distribution) Network,
  3. Operations and Maintenance of CNG and Small-scale LNG,
  4. Execution Projects for CGD Infrastructure etc.

The company has a total workforce of 140 employees at various project sites across India.

faqs.question: What is the Positron Energy IPO?
faqs.answer:
Positron Energy IPO is a SME IPO of 2048400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹51.21 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹250 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on August 12, 2024, and closes on August 14, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Positron Energy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Positron Energy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Positron Energy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Positron Energy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Positron Energy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Positron Energy IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Positron Energy IPO opens on August 12, 2024 and closes on August 14, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Positron Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: Positron Energy IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Positron Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Positron Energy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Positron Energy IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Positron Energy IPO will be done on Friday, August 16, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, August 19, 2024. Check the Positron Energy IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Positron Energy IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Positron Energy IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 20, 2024.
